item.title: Little Bit Of Help Requested :D
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

[quote=“Barrage™, post:6, topic:249668”] if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights > 0) { String text = command.substring(5); yell(""+playerName+" " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

Is this right?? will it cut off

and can someone still make the banned…thingy

Thanks[/quote]

yea thats right… and what banned thingy.

item.title: Little Bit Of Help Requested :D

item.description:
@warlock_999 wrote:

isn’t it "+playername+ or something hold on ill find it[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 09, 2008, 06:03:19 am[/size][hr]Okay yeah, try yell(""+playerName+" " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

		String text = command.substring(8);
			yell("[Yell]:  " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

}[/code]
